name: Espressif Systems
blurb: Espressif Systems designs a range of high-performance Wi-Fi+Bluetooth/BLE chipsets and modules.

name: SODAQ
blurb: What drives us is the passion to create scalable electronics solutions that work anywhere. We have implemented projects throughout developing countries, from Peru to Sri Lanka, and we will continue working where we can have the highest impact.

name: Teltonika
blurb: Teltonika IoT Group is a leading fleet management solutions manufacturer from Europe

name: TEKTELIC Communications Inc.
blurb: TEKTELIC is a leading supplier of LoRaWAN IoT equipment including best-in-class gateways and end devices.

name: Nettra
blurb: We provide comprehensive hardware and software IoT solutions

name: Actility
blurb: Actility has a strong background in large-scale project delivery and a heritage in carrier-grade systems, with leading customer deployments worldwide, making it the global leader in IoT connectivity solutions deployment.

name: Seeed Technology Co.,Ltd.
blurb: Whether you are a developer, technical supplier, or industry player, we provide products and services for your IoT needs.

name: DECODE
blurb: Decode is a Serbian company with extensive experience in design, engineering and production of devices for industrial communication and telemetry.
